casebody.data:
STATE of Montana, Ravalli County, and Ravalli County Board of Health, Plaintiffs and Appellants,
v.
Timothy D. BURT, Defendant, Appellee, and Cross-Appellant. State of Montana, Ravalli County, and Ravalli County Board of Health, Plaintiffs and Appellants,
v.
Elaine L. Burt, Defendant, Appellee, and Cross-Appellant. DA 18-0052 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: January 3, 2019
Decided: January 22, 2019

Reverse. Remand.
